DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , single center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled single ascend oral dose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics AZD7268 healthy Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: AZD7268 Single Ascending Dose Study Healthy Japanese Subjects
